sentence.Network_en: With this hurried adjuration, he cocked his blunderbuss, and stood on the offensive.
sentence.Network_cn: 他仓促地叫了一声, 便扳开几支大口径短抢的机头, 作好防守准备.

sentence.Network_en: Three eye blunderbuss, named God Gun in country, salute used in funeral.
sentence.Network_cn: 三眼铳, 在农村也叫“神枪”, 死人后出殡用的礼炮.

sentence.Network_en: Oh, dear, what a blunderbuss I am!
sentence.Network_cn: 哎, 天啊, 我真是个冒失鬼呀!
